detaileddescription.para: This is the single (non-parallel) monitoring task which takes a FlinkInputFormat, it is responsible for:

listitem.para: Monitoring snapshots of the Iceberg table.
Creating the splits corresponding to the incremental files
Assigning them to downstream tasks for further processing.

detaileddescription.para: The splits to be read are forwarded to the downstream StreamingReaderOperator which can have parallelism greater than one.
